parameters: \n<Queen Alina> Welcome to Payne. Your brother was just
advising me about the Princes Army’s
Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Don't worry I already know why you're here. I received word from Hyde. - \|\|\^
- I will only join if you defeat of my chosen warrior. \|\|\^

Well you have your answer. I must say Lord Cedric I am thoroughly impressed - \|\|\^
- by you. You wield such strength even though you don’t look it. It keeps - \|\|\^
That was too easy, and I guess we should head back to the City of Odaria. \|\|\^
Would you like to save game?

Cedric, it's great to see you. I take it you just arrived in Payne? \|\|\^
Yes, I did just arrive, I came looking for you. I'm so glad I found you here. \|\|\^
Slide the picture back to the right a little, and set opacity to 0.
We're going to be doing this for every emote! Make sure to wait 20 frames
before the next dialogue or the pictures will insta-change rather than
Well, here I am. I heard about Mother and Leya... is Idelle safe? \|\|\^
Well yes, I managed to help stabilize Luthania. I had to put an end to King - \|\|\^
- Luther. But it meant that Idelle was safe and is now married to Dormato. - \|\|\^
This is good news. I still can’t believe Leya is missing. And mother… - \|\|\^
- it’s not right. It's weird, I was feeling so ill, I felt like a part of me - \|\|\^
- was dying it’s not and my body was struggling to cope. Then I received the - \|\|\^
- news that Mother had been murdered and I realised that a part of me had. My - \|\|\^
- body could sense the change, that's how close we are that even when we are - \|\|\^
- hundreds of miles away, we feel the pain one of us is feeling. I hope you - \|\|\^
- gave the king a painful death. \|\|\^
He suffered alright. But yes it is strange. Leya was missing even before I - \|\|\^
- made it to Luthania. It’s led me to believe that she is dead. \|\|\^
If that’s true that’s terrible it would mean we would have lost both Leya and - \|\|\^
- Mother. Once this fight is over we will have to have a proper send-off for - \|\|\^
- them. Haffendens don’t deserve to be butchered and left to rot in the most - \|\|\^
Yes, we will need to Richard. \|\|\^
Anyway, let’s get down to business. I need you to head down to fields outside - \|\|\^
- Payne to help fight against the Princes' Army. They're heading here next. - \|\|\^
- They took control of Deer, Lamar and Rinsar since they killed Prince Lansee. - \|\|\^
- Oh, and I would like you to meet Jolicia. \|\|\^
Yes Richard, what is the matter? \|\|\^
I would like you to meet my younger brother Cedric. \|\|\^
Hello Lord Cedric, it’s a pleasure to meet you. \|\|\^
I can’t say I feel the same way. \|\|\^
I have heard about what you have done for the realm, you are quite the man. \|\|\^
So I’ve been told. Richard, what happened to Reyanah? You know the - \|\|\^
- woman you are betrothed to. The woman who is key to us rebuilding Lamar. \|\|\^
Nothing happened Cedric. I just don’t love her. I love Jolicia, she understands - \|\|\^
- me in ways I never thought possible. We don’t need Reyanah to rebuild Lamar, - \|\|\^
- if we can’t do it by ourselves then we weren’t meant to. \|\|\^
What nonsense is this? Of course, we need Reyanah. We don’t need whoever - \|\|\^
- this is trying to raise their position. Think about your kingdom, the - \|\|\^
- one for which you are its leader. \|\|\^
Cedric, I love your brother. In time you will understand. \|\|\^
Cedric don’t be rude. Look I will explain this to the Randals and we will - \|\|\^
- progress. For now, can you go down to the fields? \|\|\^
Oh fine, I will head down to the fields. \|\|\^
You obtained Jolicia's Entry in the Journal.
You obtained Queen Alina's Entry in the Journal.
Prince Lansee's entry in the Journal was updated.
Richard's entry in the Journal was updated.

I don’t think this is a good idea but whatever you are in charge. \|\|\^

King Dormato and Lord Cedric, I have to say thank you so much for all you have - \|\|\^
- done for my kingdom. I honestly didn’t know how much longer I would have - \|\|\^
-  been able to hold on to Payne. Roswell kept pushing harder and harder - \|\|\^
- refusing to stop. Thankfully for you and the others that have helped you - \|\|\^
- such as Lord Haffenden you have brought peace back to my kingdom. \|\|\^
It was nothing your grace, we needed to stop him. We needed to show people - \|\|\^
- that we weren’t going to allow a tyrant to come in and takeover. \|\|\^
Yes you’re right. We can’t stand by when someone who threatens the - \|\|\^
- stability of our kingdoms arises. Once again I can’t stress how thankful I - \|\|\^
- am for your help. One day I will repay the favour in being able to help you - \|\|\^
Thank you, however we need to be heading off to the other kingdoms. - \|\|\^
Well, be safe on your journey. \|\|\^
Queen Alina's entry in the Journal was updated.
